system.description:
Entrusted with both divine power and a powerful artifact, none can say that the expectations placed on you aren’t high. Whether you see this as a challenge to be embraced or an unwelcome burden is, of course, up to you. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You can spend 3 artifact charges to use @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity}.
  • When you select a new wielder spell, you can choose from the wielder or herald list.
  • Half your cleric levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of gaining access to the Extra Attack and Spellsword features.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels of cleric, 3 levels of wielder
